content: this pattern was part of a live creative crochet corner event the pattern is free when signing up for the creative crochet corner newsletter 1 a free replay of the video tutorial can be watched over here on the creative crochet corner 2 website or over here on youtube 3 1 https //go creativecrochetcorner com/a38475/ 2 https //www creativecrochetcorner com/video/baby-bean-booties-live-tutorial-with-brenda-k-b-anderson/ 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=b_e8khrrck4&t=24s
